triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs serve as the core intelligent agents that interpret descriptive information and control the physical production system.

triples.name: Digital twin
triples.relevance: Digital twins register control interfaces and provide descriptive information about the production system that LLM-agents interpret.

triples.name: Automation
triples.relevance: The framework is built on industrial automation system components that execute low-level functionalities.

triples.name: Production planning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes autonomous planning of production processes using LLM-agents to orchestrate sequences of operations.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: The paper proposes LLM-based intelligent agents that operate at different automation system levels for autonomous planning and control.

triples.name: Smart manufacturing
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates smart factory concepts for more agile, flexible, and adaptive production processes using intelligent agents.

triples.name: Industrial process control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel approach to production control by combining LLM-agents with digital twins for autonomous process control.

triples.name: Manufacturing
triples.relevance: The paper addresses manufacturing process execution through retrofitting automation systems and digital twins in a modular production facility.
